title: Salerno Beachhead 1945 - War Film - Directed by Lewis Milestone - With Lloyd Bridges & Dana Andrews

sources.title: Salerno Beachhead 1945 - War Film - Directed by Lewis Milestone - With Lloyd Bridges & Dana Andrews
sources.description:
When a GI platoon lands on the beaches of Italy during WWII, the troops face uncertainty and danger with every step. Those who survive the initial landing, including Sgt. Tyne and Sgt. Ward, pursue a mission. Between marching banter and quick dashes under pressure, they outfox patrols, secure the house, and move to disable the bridge, keeping the mission front and center.

Original title: A Walk in the Sun (1945)
Directed by Lewis Milestone

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/cUGRkD0AYuo

Main cast:
Dana Andrews - Staff Sgt. Bill Tyne
Richard Conte - Pvt. Rivera
George Tyne - Pvt. Jake Friedman
John Ireland - PFC. Windy Craven
Lloyd Bridges - Staff Sgt. Ward
Sterling Holloway - Pvt. 'Mac' McWilliams
Norman Lloyd - Pvt. Jack 'Arch' Archimbeau
Herbert Rudley - Staff Sgt. Eddie Porter
Richard Benedict - PFC. Tranella
Huntz Hall - PFC. Carraway
James Cardwell - Sgt. 'Hosk' Hoskins
George Offerman Jr. - Pvt. Tinker
Steve Brodie - Pvt. Judson
Matt Willis - Plt. Sgt. Pete 'Hal' Halverson
Chris Drake - PFC. Tim Rankin
Alvin Hammer - Pvt. Johnson
Victor Cutler - Pvt. Cousins
Jay Norris - Pvt. James
John Kellogg - Pvt. Riddle
